capability.name: Liquidity Risk Models
capability.definition: This capability focuses on developing and maintaining comprehensive liquidity risk models for both dispositive and structural liquidity risk management, including advanced analytics like LaR and LVaR.
capability.role: Develop and maintain models for dispositive and structural liquidity risk management, including liquidity gap analysis, Liquidity at Risk (LaR) and Liquidity Value at Risk (LVaR).
capability.example: Financial engineers develop and refine liquidity risk management models

key_features.name: Liquidity gap analysis
key_features.description: Enables liquidity gap analysis to support this capability focuses on developing and maintaining comprehensive liquidity risk models for both dispositive and structural liquidity risk management, including advanced analytics like lar and lvar
